attributes.action: Initiate article 50 to leave the EU with immediate effect (no second referendum)
attributes.additional_details: This petition is based on the results of the recent EU referendum and the elected conservative governments manifesto at the last general election.
attributes.background: Following the majority UK decision to leave the EU, there is hesitation to initiate article 50. This should be done with immediate effect. There should be no second referendum or it goes against the will of the people who have already had the chance to voice their democratic right.
